heading: HB05089
0: AN ACT WITHDRAWING ALL TAX EXEMPTIONS AND INCENTIVES GRANTED TO ALL TELECOMMUNICATIONS SERVICES COMPANY WITH LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISE
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2017-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05089
FULL TITLE : AN ACT WITHDRAWING ALL TAX EXEMPTIONS AND INCENTIVES GRANTED TO ALL TELECOMMUNICATIONS SERVICES COMPANY WITH LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISE
ABSTRACT : Provides that all tax exemptions or incentives of whatever nature, granted to, or presently enjoyed by all persons, natural or juridical, rendering telecommunications services and enjoying legislative franchises are hereby withdrawn and revoked.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TIANGCO, TOBIAS "TOBY" M.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Garcia (G.) (086 2017-05-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2017-02-28
